text: Benjamin Fafale (born 14 September 1968) is a retired weightlifter who represented the Solomon Islands at the Summer Olympics. Fafale competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics held in Seoul, where he finished 22nd, at 20 years old he was the youngest competitor for the Solomon Islands.Sports Reference Profile ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Solomon Islands male weightlifters Category:Olympic weightlifters of the Solomon Islands Category:Weightlifters at the 1988 Summer Olympics
title: Benjamin Fafale
